text: So decided to finally switch to VSCode cause of the 1.6 release, and I am a noob at this (I used JuliaPro before cause it was like RStudio/Spyder and "just worked"), how do I run the code and get the REPL? I only see terminal in the bottom and no REPL. When I do `Julia: Start REPL`  in the terminal within VSCode I get `command not found Julia:`
